titleStmt.title: The way to be rich, according to the practice of the great Audley who begun with two hundred pound in the year 1605, and dyed worth four hundred thousand pound this instant November, 1662.
titleStmt.author: G. B.
Audley, Hugh, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to G.B. by Wing (2nd ed., rev.).
Item at reel 1394:26 identified as Wing A4200 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
